Articles.Content: hello just wondering if theres a tip to increase frame rate. seems the game is kinda jeky for me when moving camera around etc i have a good pc handles alot of high end games. thanks

Don\'t look at the planet, look at your rocket from above.

Hope that helps.

Set the shadow and light samples to be devidable by 8..

and increasing them higher than 16 is unnecessary.. I personally can\'t see the diference..
